snippet: C. J. Fair had 18 points and 10 rebounds, the freshman Jerami Grant scored a season-high 14 points and No. 9 Syracuse secured a 63-47 home victory against No. 25 Notre Dame on Monday.
abstract: Syracuse defeats Notre Dame, 63-47, in men's college basketball; other men's and women's college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: C. J. Fair had 18 points and 10 rebounds, the freshman Jerami Grant scored a season-high 14 points and No. 9 Syracuse secured a 63-47 home victory against No. 25 Notre Dame on Monday.
